title: Business Applications System Administrator III (Team Lead)
content:
At Qualtrics, we create software the world’s best brands use to deliver exceptional frontline experiences, build high-performing teams, and design products people love. But we are more than a platform—we are the creators and stewards of the Experience Management category serving over 18K clients globally. Building a category takes grit, determination, and a disdain for convention—but most of all it requires close-knit, high-functioning teams with an unwavering dedication to serving our customers. When you join one of our teams, you’ll be part of a nimble group that’s empowered to set aggressive goals and move fast to achieve them. Strategic risks are encouraged and complex problems are solved together, by passing the microphone and iterating until the best solution comes to light. You won’t have to look to find growth opportunities—ready or not, they’ll find you. From retail to government to healthcare, we’re on a mission to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. Join over 6,000 people across the globe who think that’s work worth doing.
The Role
The Business Applications Team Lead
Why We Have This Role
The Business Applications Team Lead is responsible for maintaining the usability, stability, and security of Qualtrics's corporate SaaS applications in addition to mentoring a group of both new and experienced Business Applications and Go-To-Market Systems Administrators located in the Mexico City office. The team is committed to owning and managing Qualtrics's corporate SaaS applications through system governance, technical support, and implementation of new functionality to the corporate tech stack. This role is part of an expansion of the global BizApps team into Mexico City and will report directly to the global BizApps manager based in the US.
How You’ll Find Success

Understanding business processes and objectives & owning strategic initiatives that spans across multiple departments.
Collaborating effectively with teams across different functions to provide guidance on system best practices & recommendations.
Staying updated with technology trends.
Prioritizing user experience and adoption.
Implementing effective change management.
Measuring and tracking systems performance.
Staying agile and adaptable.
Continuously learning and growing.
Working closely with the global BizApps manager to ensure the entire team is working together towards the BizApps team vision and goals.

How You’ll Grow

Taking on increasing managerial responsibilities as part of a rapidly growing global team.
Broadening business acumen by collaborating and understanding organizational goals and objectives.
Expanding technical proficiency in relevant business applications and systems.
Establishing system roadmaps and strategic initiatives.
Developing leadership skills through project leadership and mentorship.
Setting goals, tracking progress, and creating action plans for professional growth.
Understanding business needs and team capacity to determine scope of the team.

Things You’ll Do

Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand business needs and resolve issues.
Develop and execute application strategy and roadmap.
Mentor and train team members, fostering their growth and development at all levels.
Oversee data security, compliance & risk management for applications.
Identify and optimize business processes.
Determine and evaluate team capacity and bandwidth to increase scope of the team.

What We’re Looking For

Bachelor's Degree
5+ years of technical system administrator experience.
Professional English fluency required.
Management/Team Lead experience in a technical environment preferred.

What You Should Know About This Team

Corporate-wide impact: The system ownership and management extends across multiple departments, and any changes made and implemented have a significant impact and high visibility throughout the entire company.
Consistent learning: The system knowledge is vast, and team members are encouraged to expand their scope as they progress in seniority. There are always opportunities for growth and learning.
Collaboration: Implementing best practices for systems requires working collaboratively across departments such as Engineering, Security, Procurement, and Go-To-Market. It's a collective effort to ensure we have top-notch systems and deliver exceptional support for them.

Our Team’s Favorite Perks and Benefits

Experience Bonus program offering unique experiences on the 1-year anniversary with the company.
Global Wellness Reimbursement program to support employee wellness.
Global Mental Health Benefit through Ginger, providing 24/7 mental health support for employees and their dependents.
Savings Fund program for automatic monthly contributions and employer match.

As part of this commitment, Qualtrics will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided with reasonable accommodations. If reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please let your Qualtrics contact/recruiter know.
 
Qualtrics Work Experience - As we look to the future, we believe that our teams are better together. Being together will help us learn more, grow faster and ultimately deliver better results for our customers and Qualtrics. Roles tied to an office location work 4 days per week in the office together and 1 day from home, with a strong spirit of flexibility around taking time for personal, health, and family moments in our work weeks. Our managers work with their teams to create a collaborative, engaged work environment, and arrangement that works for each of our team members.

Sign up for exclusive access to content created with you in mind and get the scoop on what we have going on at Qualtrics - upcoming events, behind the behind the scenes stories from the team, interview tips, hot jobs, and more. No spam - we promise! You'll hear from us two times a month max with fresh, totally tailored info - so be sure to stay connected as you explore your best role and company fit.
